body_html:
Notice that this branch changes overflow behavior with respect to numpy as illustrated by this script.

Instead of having int32, int16 accumulate into int64, int32, this PR accumulates into int32, int16.
body_text:
Notice that this branch changes overflow behavior with respect to numpy as illustrated by this script.
Instead of having int32, int16 accumulate into int64, int32, this PR accumulates into int32, int16.
body:
Notice that this branch [changes overflow behavior](https://paste.fedoraproject.org/paste/NNhvsbX8WjFLXHnL1YF50Q/raw) with respect to numpy as illustrated by [this script](https://paste.fedoraproject.org/paste/yIiN1nSFOGwBM0mUbDmcjg/raw).

Instead of having int32, int16 accumulate into int64, int32, this PR accumulates into int32, int16.
